anytime:
你不喜歡我，我一點都不介意。
我活下來，不是為了取悅你
自由，是在一切事物上，有自我掌控的能力
把今天照顧好，明天才能更好
智者解決問題，天才預防問題
morning: However long the night, the dawn will break.
Intellectuals solve problems; geniuses prevent them
afternoon: You're more fun than bubble wrap!
evening: You made someone smile today, I know it.
The day was better for your efforts.
